titleStmt.title: The immortality of mans soule, proved both by scripture and reason contrary to the fancie of R.O. in his book intituled Mans mortality ...
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library.
Attributed to Thomas Hooker. cf. NUC pre-1956.
